CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE of solar cells based on polymer : PC71BM as an active layer was dramatically increased from 7.04 to 8.65% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. Solar cells
2. Polymer (specifically, PC71BM)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "solar cells" and "polymer : PC71BM".
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
Material Name: PC71BM (polymer used as an active layer in solar cells)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC71BM (polymer) |

This table only includes the Material Name entity that was identified in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE of solar cells based on polymer : PC71BM as an active layer was dramatically increased from 7.04 to 8.65% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency
2. solar cells: Photovoltaic cells or Solar cells
3. based on: Utilizing or using as a component
4. polymer: Specifically, Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) or PC71BM.
5. PC71BM: A specific type of polymer, Poly[3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester].

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE)
2. Efficiency of solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE)
2. Efficiency (of solar cells)
3. PC71BM (as a material)

So, the relevant Property Name entities in the paragraph are:
1. Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE)
2. Efficiency (of solar cells)
3. PC71BM (as a material with the property of being an active layer in solar cells).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power Conversion Efficiency (PCE) |
| Efficiency (of solar cells) |
| PC71BM (as an active layer in solar cells) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The PCE of solar cells based on polymer : PC71BM as an active layer was dramatically increased from 7.04 to 8.65% , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCE: Photoconversion Efficiency
2. Solar cells: Electronic devices that convert sunlight into electricity
3. Polymer: Specifically, PC71BM, which is a type of organic material used as an active layer in solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PCE: Photoconversion Efficiency
2. 7.04% and 8.65%: Values representing the initial and increased PCE, respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
